column2: Incredible natural formations, legendary monuments, and other unique locations will be noted and described in certain counties.
Landmarks will not be described. (Great Works will still be present, unless disabled using another game rule.)
Declaring a holy war will impose a 5 or 10 year cooldown, preventing characters from declaring multiple holy wars in quick succession.
Declaring a holy war will not impose a cooldown, allowing characters to declare multiple holy wars in quick succession.
Haskalahs, Thelemas, Neuhumanists, Adonists, Oasites and Marianne Jacobins will be able to perform gay marriages through a targeted decision.
Every religion will be able to perform gay marriages through a targeted decision.
No religions will be able to perform gay marriages.
Gain the Recent Holy War modifier.\n
